messages.subject: Re: glad to be *home*
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Karen, I m also missing hearing from the gang on the message boards, and I ve been enjoying a fall weekend in the Yukon instead of the conference. Nice to
messages.messageBody:
Hi Karen,

I'm also missing hearing from the gang on the message boards, and
I've been enjoying a fall weekend in the Yukon instead of the
conference. Nice to hear that I'm not the only one not there. Sigh..

Nadine

messages.subject: Re: glad to be *home*
messages.msgSnippet: Ha!  And then I realize that just as I found the list, everyone is off at the conference! LOL.  I hope you all had a great weekend, I can t wait to hear about
messages.messageBody:
Ha! And then I realize that just as I found the list, everyone is off
at the conference! LOL. I hope you all had a great weekend, I can't
wait to hear about it. I hope we can make it next year.

Karen(treehuggermama)

messages.subject: glad to be *home*
messages.msgSnippet: I go out of town and come back to find unschooling boards down!  I m so glad to find many of you here.  For those of you that don t know me, I m an unschooling
messages.messageBody:
I go out of town and come back to find unschooling boards down! I'm
so glad to find many of you here. For those of you that don't know
me, I'm an unschooling mother of three, ages 3, 9, & 10. My life
changed when I found unschooling. I have never been happier or lived
more joyfully with my family.

Karen (treehuggermama)
